question: Has your child ever been enrolled in Primary School before?
options: No, this is the first time they will be enrolled
Yes, but I want to transfer them to another school
Yes, but I have lost the required documents

question: Will the child have completed their 6th year of age by December 31 of the current year?
Is the child a permanent resident of the area where the school is located?
options: Yes, we live within the school district
No, we live in another area

question: Do you have the required enrollment documents (e.g. birth certificate, health booklet, proof of residence)?
Who is submitting the enrollment application?
options: The parent or legal guardian of the child
An authorized person with a signed declaration

question: Do you have a kindergarten attendance certificate?
